trigger.name: PostgreSQL: Required checkpoints occurs too frequently (over {$PG.CHECKPOINTS_REQ.MAX.WARN})
trigger.description: Checkpoints are points in the sequence of transactions at which it is guaranteed that the heap and index data files have been updated with all information written before that checkpoint. At checkpoint time, all dirty data pages are flushed to disk and a special checkpoint record is written to the log file. https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/wal-configuration.html
